text: Je dois dire que le café est bon  ,c'était un bon spot a St-Jérôme .Nous venons d'y aller et la très déçus ,on demande un croissant aux amandes qui n'est fourre qu'avec une sorte de confiture bon marche, on cherche la pate d'amandes ???? et le croissant au beurre est  très sale ,En plus tout est réchauffé au micro-ondes ,alors si vous êtes comme nous conscient de la sante de votre corps évitez d'y manger .

Adorable spot for lunch in this cute little town! Also awesome that someone knew English and explained to us what they had at the cafe to order. I got a grilled chicken salad with beets, and it was delicious. Quick, cute, and quaint.
Un café de rêve.  Beaucoup de place, décor moderne et un bon café.

Free wifi

Cozy inside however a bit loud
They don't have organic milk so I haven't had any of their Java drinks

They do have some good teas available 

No real selection of gluten free options for lunch or snacks

I am here at least twice a week. Friendly staff, good sandwiches, great muffins (love the melange montagnards muffin!). Decent coffee on good days! Love the breakfast sandwiches too, made fresh to order.
They have an inside terrasse and it's also a restaurant bar on the other side, so they have some nice drinks.
